actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution for more effort by Congress to solve economic and energy problems.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives postpone all recesses until these economic and energy dilemmas have been met with proper and equitable legislation. Declares that the committees of the House should meet more often and should concentrate their efforts in such meetings to solve these economic and energy dilemmas; and that bills dealing with our economic and energy dilemmas should be reported promptly to the House for consideration. Declares that the House should meet on Mondays through Fridays or more often if necessary to facilitate prompt consideration of legislation dealing with the economy and energy.

titles.title: Resolution for more effort by Congress to solve economic and energy problems.
